title: Russian police detain around 200 people, including leading opposition figures, at Moscow meeting
content:
1. Russian police detain around 200 people, including leading opposition figures, at Moscow meeting  Yahoo News
  2. Police detain participants in Russian opposition forum  The Associated Press
  3. Russian police detain hundreds at forum held by opposition organization deemed 'undesirable'  USA TODAY
  4. 200 opposition activists detained at democratic forum in Moscow. Russian authorities says they were breaking Covid-19 protocol  CNN
  5. Russian police detain more than 170 at opposition forum in Moscow  Los Angeles Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Russian police detain around 200 people, including leading opposition figures, at Moscow meeting  Yahoo News
Police detain participants in Russian opposition forum  The Associated Press
Russian police detain hundreds at forum held by opposition organization deemed 'undesirable'  USA TODAY
200 opposition activists detained at democratic forum in Moscow. Russian authorities says they were breaking Covid-19 protocol  CNN
Russian police detain more than 170 at opposition forum in Moscow  Los Angeles Times

localize.title: 俄罗斯警方在莫斯科会议上拘留了包括反对派主要人物在内的约200人。
俄羅斯警方在莫斯科會議上拘留了包括反對派主要人物在內的約200人。
